title: 45.0112 STREET AND EMAIL ADDRESSES REQUIRED.
text: Licensees or applicants for licenses issued by the commissioner shall provide to the commissioner a residence telephone number, a street address where the licensee actually resides, a street address where the licensee's business is physically located, and a current email address for business use. The individual shall notify the department of any change in street address, email address for business use, or residence telephone number within ten days.
